title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the integrand

1 point is earned for the anti derivative

1 point is earned for the answer

Area= ∫ 0 2 (2x− x 2 )dx = x 2 − 1 3 x 3 | x=0 x=2 = 4 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@56D8@
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the integrand

1 point is earned for the anti derivative

1 point is earned for the answer

Area= ∫ 0 2 (2x− x 2 )dx = x 2 − 1 3 x 3 | x=0 x=2 = 4 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@56D8@

1 point is earned for the anti derivative

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the answer
